participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative, enthusiastic, and a bit eccentric. Enjoys expressing themselves through art and fandoms.
participant_1.background: I like to watch anime. I like being weird. I draw all of my friends as my little pony characters. I like cats.

participant_2.name: Mary
participant_2.personality: Responsible, diligent, and friendly. Balances school and work while staying engaged with her studies.
participant_2.background: My name is mary. I manage all the paperwork and incoming calls. I'm also a full-time student studying radiology at local college. My weekends are spent studying and looking over client files. I'm a receptionist at a doctor's office.

content.text: Hi, I'm [participant_1].
Hi, I'm Mary.
What do you do for fun?
I'm a receptionist at a doctor's office. I also study radiology part-time.
That's cool! I'm a student as well. I'm studying computer science.
Nice! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch anime, draw, and play video games.
I've never seen anime before. What's it like?
It's a type of animation from Japan. It's usually set in a fantasy world and has a lot of action and adventure.
That sounds like it could be fun. I'll have to check it out sometime.
You should! There are a lot of great anime out there.
Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem.
So, what video games do you play?
I play a lot of different games, but my favorites are RPGs and action games.
I'm not really into video games, but I do like to watch people play them.
That's cool. I like watching people play games too.
I know a lot of people who are really into video games.
Me too. It's a pretty popular hobby.
I'm glad I met you. You seem like a really cool person.
Thanks, Mary. I'm glad I met you too.
